actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 to give priority to users of petroleum engaged in transportation of fuels on inland waterways.

summary.text: Provides, under the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973, that priority be given to users of petroleum engaged in transportation of fuels on inland waterways.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 to give priority to users of petroleum engaged in transportation of fuels on inland waterways.
